marketplace.name: mac-skills
marketplace.description: Collection of Agent Skills plugins for various tasks

plugins.name: algorithmic-art
plugins.description: Creating algorithmic art using p5.js with seeded randomness and interactive parameter exploration. Use for generative art, algorithmic art, flow fields, or particle systems.

plugins.name: brand-guidelines
plugins.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact. Use for brand colors, style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards.

plugins.name: canvas-design
plugins.description: Create beautiful visual art in .png and .pdf documents using design philosophy. Use for creating posters, pieces of art, designs, or other static pieces.

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use for building web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications.

plugins.name: slack-gif-creator
plugins.description: Knowledge and utilities for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack. Use when users request animated GIFs for Slack.

plugins.name: theme-factory
plugins.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that can be applied to any artifact, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.

plugins.name: docx
plugins.description: Comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis with support for tracked changes, comments, formatting preservation, and text extraction. Use for .docx files.

plugins.name: pdf
plugins.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms. Use for PDF processing.

plugins.name: pptx
plugins.description: Presentation creation, editing, and analysis. Use for .pptx files when creating new presentations, modifying content, working with layouts, or adding comments.

plugins.name: video-analysis
plugins.description: AI-powered video content analysis capability using Volces ARK API. Use to analyze video files, identify key moments, extract product features, or perform custom video analysis.

plugins.name: xlsx
plugins.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization. Use for .xlsx, .xlsm, .csv, .tsv files.

plugins.name: doc-coauthoring
plugins.description: Guide users through a structured workflow for co-authoring documentation. Use when writing documentation, proposals, technical specs, decision docs, or similar structured content.

plugins.name: internal-comms
plugins.description: Resources for writing internal communications. Use for status reports, leadership updates, 3P updates, company newsletters, FAQs, incident reports, project updates, etc.

plugins.name: mcp-builder
plugins.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers. Use when building MCP servers to integrate external APIs or services in Python (FastMCP) or Node/TypeScript (MCP SDK).

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Guide for creating effective skills. Use when wanting to create a new skill or update an existing skill that extends Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.

plugins.name: web-artifacts-builder
plugins.description: Suite of tools for creating elaborate, multi-component claude.ai HTML artifacts using modern frontend web technologies (React, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui). Use for complex artifacts requiring state management, routing, or shadcn/ui components.

plugins.name: webapp-testing
plugins.description: Toolkit for interacting with and testing local web applications using Playwright. Supports verifying frontend functionality, debugging UI behavior, capturing browser screenshots, and viewing browser logs.
